location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Newnham, Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from William Newnham, Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, informing that the Office of Marine Agent in the Persian Gulf had been abolished and its duties, including supplies of provisions to the Marine Vessels, were entrusted to the Residency, without any increase in the allowance granted by the Governor to the Resident.
